td6.data

Class LevelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.data.LevelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Level

    public class LevelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Level
    implementation of level which allows to have and modify data about a level
    Invariants :
    for ( Case c : boardCases ) { c.typeof(Wall) || c.typeof(Corridor) || c.typeof(GhostDoor);}
